AMLab members will be (co-)supervising 3 new postdoc positions on AI for Meta-materials, which are part of the AI for Sustainable Molecules and Materials program. The deadline for applications has been extended to 10 June. Apply here.

  • Jan-Willem van de Meent and Corentin Coulais are looking for a postdoc on “Metamaterials designed by AI for sustainable steel”.
  • Patrick Forré, Saer Samanipour and Antonia Praetorius are looking for a postdoc on “Deep representation & simplification of chemical additives for safe-and-sustainable-by-design plastics”.
  • Herke van Hoof, Peter Bolhuis, Sara Jabbari-Farouji, Francesca Quattrocchio, Peter Schall, and Alberto Pérez de Alba Ortíz are looking for a postdoc on “Machine Learning-based models of plant protein mixtures for sustainable food design”.
